explanation: [0-0] A couple is sleeping in bed in their bedroom. The walls of the room are white, there is a nightstand next to the bed with black and red English text on it, and red and white text below. A red circle surrounds the man's head.

[0-4] Suddenly, the bed starts to shake violently. A green arrow appears in the room, pointing to the bed, and a scary monster sticker appears in the upper left corner. The man quickly wakes up from his sleep, rolls off the bed while holding his wife, and protects her head with his body. A red arrow points at them.

[0-4] Suddenly, the bed starts to shake violently. A green arrow appears in the room, pointing to the bed, and a scary monster sticker appears in the upper left corner. The man quickly wakes up from his sleep, rolls off the bed while holding his wife, and protects her head with his body. A red arrow points at them.

[0-4] Suddenly, the bed starts to shake violently. A green arrow appears in the room, pointing to the bed, and a scary monster sticker appears in the upper left corner. The man quickly wakes up from his sleep, rolls off the bed while holding his wife, and protects her head with his body. A red arrow points at them.

[0-4] Suddenly, the bed starts to shake violently. A green arrow appears in the room, pointing to the bed, and a scary monster sticker appears in the upper left corner. The man quickly wakes up from his sleep, rolls off the bed while holding his wife, and protects her head with his body. A red arrow points at them.

[4-9] The man then uses a pillow to protect his wife. White and purple English text appears in the image. After confirming his wife's safety, the man slowly straightens up and looks around. Drooling and red English text appear in the image, full of love. The man remains seated, with a serious expression, tightly protecting his wife, and observing the situation after the earthquake. Purple and white English text appears in the image.
